import axios from"axios";// const API_URL = "http://localhost:5000/api/auth/"
var API_URL='http://dietplannerrds-env.eba-s2nrkgap.eu-north-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/api/auth/';var register=function register(username,email,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"signup",{username:username,email:email,password:password});};var login=function login(username,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"signin",{username:username,password:password}).then(function(response){if(response.data.token){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));}return response.data;});};var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem("user");};var authService={register:register,login:login,logout:logout};export default authService;
